profile.name: patak
profile.headline: Senior Software Engineer | Delivering scalable and efficient solutions at DigitalOcean
profile.summary: Highly motivated developer with a passion for building robust applications using Node.js, TypeScript, Rust, Vue.js, Vite, and Rollup. With a strong focus on database sharding and systems programming, I excel in driving innovation and efficiency.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
description: Designed and implemented scalable backend architectures using Node.js, TypeScript, and Rust for high-performance applications.

experience.title: Freelance Developer
description: Developed and maintained multiple open-source projects on Vue.js, Vite, and Rollup.
Collaborated with clients to deliver custom software solutions that met their specific needs.

experience.title: Open Source Maintainer
description: Contributed to the development and maintenance of several open-source projects on GitHub.
Ensured code quality, security, and compatibility across different platforms.

Database Sharding: rolldown: Fast Rust bundler for JavaScript with Rollup-compatible API.
Systems Programming: rolldown: Fast Rust bundler for JavaScript with Rollup-compatible API.
